question: What is the order if our tongue comes in teeth while eating and blood comes out?
answer:
QUESTION
Respected Mufti sahab. While eating the food mine tounge comes in teeth and blood comes out. What should one do. Whether stop eating because blood will go togather and eating blood is not permissible? or any other order ? May Allah give you people best reward for great sacrify and service. Jazakallah khair. Remember in dua. Allah hafiz.
ANSWER


Share:
Assalaamu Alaykum wa Rahmatullaahi wa Barakaatuhu

Flowing blood is impure. If blood flows on the tongue then one should stop
eating
until the flow of blood stops.

Was salaam

Mufti E Desai
Fatwa Dept.Unanswered
